name: Cats Always Land on their Feet
name_original: Cats Always Land on their Feet
description:
Bevy Jam 3 - Side Effects

Cats always seem to land on their feet... Even when weird things happen when they jump.

Use WASD or Arrow Keys to move. Spacebar to Jump. Escape to restart. Zero to skip a level.

Code Available Here

Sounds Generated with ChipTone

Graphics and  Art - Selkaine, Programming and Level Design - MyWrongShoe

There is a bug where the player clips into the ground and crashes/freezes the game. Sorry...
